duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the IT department, providing technology vision and leadership in the development and implementation of IT services and programs.
Lead the planning and implementation of information systems to support business operations.
Manage multiple information and communications systems and projects, including voice, data, imaging, and office automation.
Implement business continuity and disaster recovery plans, as well as overseeing and evaluating system security, privacy, and backup procedures.
Upgrade platforms from on-site to cloud-based applications and lead/participate in IT-related projects.
Ensure strong proficiency with MS SharePoint and previous experience with scripting (PowerShell or Perl).
Work with C#, ASP.NET, .NET Frameworks, JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, XML, jQuery, SQL Server, Web Services, Power Apps, and Power Automate.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree, preferably in Computer Science or related (Master's preferred)
